author: cziegeler
msg: Distinguish between output format and delivery channel (web console or zip)

author: rwesten
msg: STANBOL-811: The TopicClassificationEngine does no longer use File#tempFile(..) to create the folder for performing CVFold's. The root folder is now configured by the unit tests. Within OSGI the property is not set and would cause a NPE if no ManagedSolrServer is present (This should be reviewed by ogrisel); Minor: also added some loggings to the unit tests.

author: eric
msg: Improve POP3 TOP command by fetching whole message instead of head/body separately, patch provided by Rustam Aliyev (PROTOCOLS-105)
